name: Bee
text: 0:1, Visible.

name: Nectar
text: 1:0, Nourish 1.

name: Bandit
text: 1:2, create a ${146} in your opponent's hand.

name: Spy
text: 1:0, create a ${143} in your opponent's hand.

name: Night Vision
text:
1:0, Tutor 2.
When played, gain Sight 3.

name: Disintegrate
text: 1:1, transform the next 1-cost card in the story into a ${144}.

name: Juggle
text:
1:1.
When played, put the 3 leftmost cards in your hand on the bottom of your deck, then draw that many.
(Of the 3, your leftmost card will be closest to the top of the deck)

name: Sine
text: 2:4, Starve 4.

name: Fishing Boat
text: 2:0, Tutor 1, Tutor 1, Tutor 1.

name: Raise Dead
text: 2:2, put the top card of your discard pile on top of your deck.

name: Bastet
text:
2:1, this card retains all changes to points as it resolves.
(For example, if this card was nourished by 3, it stays a 2:4 once it is in the discard pile)

name: Imprison
text: 2:0, set both players points to 0, then give your opponent 1 point for each card in their hand.

name: Crypt
text: 2:2, your last card in the story transforms into the top card in your discard pile with the same cost as it.

name: Stable
text: 3:3, remove from the game and note the top card of your discard pile. This card's effect becomes to add a copy of the noted card to your hand.

name: Boar
text: 3:4, discard your X leftmost cards, where X is the number of cards later in the story.

name: Paranoia
text:
3:3.
When played, gain Sight X, where X is the number of cards before this in the story.

name: Pelican
text: 4:4, remove from the game each card in your hand that costs 0 or 1. +1 for each card removed.

name: Beekeep
text: 5:5, remove from the game and note all 0-cost cards in your discard pile. This card's effect becomes to add to your discard pile a copy of each of the noted cards.

name: Lotus
text: 5:0, Inspire 2. If this is your last card in the story, set both players points to 0.

name: Eagle
text:
6:6, Nourish 2.
When played, gain Sight 4 and transform each card in your hand into a ${19}.

name: Ecology
text:
7:2.
When played, gain 10 mana this round.

name: Horus
text: 7:7, costs 0 if you can see at least 3 of your opponent's cards in the story.

name: Icarus
text: 7:7, costs 0 if you have 5 cards in the story

name: Enrage
text:
8:2, give each card later in the story -X, where X is its cost.
When played, give each card ealier in the story -X.
